entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @realDonaldTrump Hey assclown ... do your job - 140,000 + have covid-19 and 2,800 + have died (as of 3pm pst) ... when we really test,by the way you can’t get a test, even when you are sicker than shit,because there are not enough here in North Orange County, CA - stop lying about this. #resign
